text:
Today we're learning English with 
Disney Pixar's animation Cars!

You'll learn lots of driving related 
vocabulary that you can start using now,

as well as better understanding 
the American English pronunciation.

Because this is what we do every week. 
Three times a week we help you to learn

fast English without getting lost, without 
missing the jokes and without subtitles.

Just like Amir who says that our Disney 
playlist is growing and he loves it but

he also actually loves all of our lessons.
So make sure you hit that Subscribe button

and the Bell down below, that way you will 
not miss a single one of our new lessons.

I hope you enjoyed learning with Cars today, but 
before you watch without subtitles and test your

knowledge with some quiz questions make sure you 
head on over to our Instagram: @RealLife.English

because we publish lessons there every single 
day so you can continue learning with us.

Not only that but I'm also there every 
Thursday LIVE with an exclusive lesson for you.

So make sure you follow us there and I hope 
you'll be joining me in one of the lives soon!
